attributes.action: Ensure the exemption in the Hunting Act that allows dogs to be used to flush quarry for Birds of Prey is upheld
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After long and detailed consultation on the Hunting Act it was agreed that there would be an exemption to allow the use of dogs to flush quarry for birds of prey.  This exemption was intended to be used by falconers in their lawful sport of falconry.
